channel.title: Cleanup/delete old servers?
channel.description:
Why are there so many servers on this section? Can't a mod delete all of the servers that are not being used theres no reason to have like 40 somthing pages of servers that aren't even up.
There should be a clear list of servers that you can actually play.

item.title: Cleanup/delete old servers?
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:19, topic:528601"][quote author=Not_a_bot link=topic=647356.msg4354230#msg4354230 date=1377198488]

What’s happening LOL,

First someone comes crying about releasing all RSC servers under GPL and now they come to clean the advertisement section.

What’s next? Find all dead download links and remove them from the threads???

FYI. Not_a_bot is a troll.

That is incorrect, people assume I’m a troll because they don’t know any better. Limiting end-users is clearly the intent of this community by disregarding intentions (look at the history of server owners here before you start judging me). Free software benefits us all.


[/quote]
People assume that you are a troll, because you are. Even if you were not a troll, people here, in MoparScape, would not give a shit about your opinion, and you know it, but because you are a troll, you do it any way, in attempt to annoy, or amuse other members.[/quote]

Hmm…I’m not quite sure what’s worse, your atrocious use of the comma or the redundant reasoning. Frankly I’m not offended when I’m called a troll, it hurts you more than it does me because it only confirms you or your friends can’t comprehend the merits of free software and freedom. Instead of continuing the repetition of ignorant and closed minded thinking, perhaps review and research what I or others like me bring you so you yourself can be successful one day. The freedoms restored from free software will bring upon an era of revolutionary ideas by users like you and I without worry for concern for licensing restrictions. Stop proprietary operators from controlling your rights!

I will leave you with a video to further reflect upon:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZPPikY3uLIQ[/youtube]

Read full topic

What’s happening LOL,

First someone comes crying about releasing all RSC servers under GPL and now they come to clean the advertisement section.

What’s next? Find all dead download links and remove them from the threads???

FYI. Not_a_bot is a troll.
[/quote]

That is incorrect, people assume I’m a troll because they don’t know any better. Limiting end-users is clearly the intent of this community by disregarding intentions (look at the history of server owners here before you start judging me). Free software benefits us all.

[/quote]
People assume that you are a troll, because you are. Even if you were not a troll, people here, in MoparScape, would not give a shit about your opinion, and you know it, but because you are a troll, you do it any way, in attempt to annoy, or amuse other members.
